reply.author: workeffortwaste
reply.content:
Sorry to hear that, if you contact me on support@workeffortwaste.com with details about the problem I'll see if I can resolve this for you.

Edit: Emailed with the customer, and there was a misunderstanding with the application. They expected it to be a widget for phones, whereas it's an application designed for Android Wear devices.

reply.content: Hi, thanks. Are you referring to the number rotating in from the bottom? If so, that's deliberately meant to show the next hour phasing in, rather than the current hour (which is the number rotating out at the top). If it's not that then feel free to contact me on support@workeffortwaste.com and I'll try and help.
